thread.section_title: Ski.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ski.com | www.ski.com
thread.title: Ellen

author: Ellen
title: Ellen
text: My client kept asking about different properties and Melanie responded with the information the same or next day. Most rates hadn't been established yet for the 2017 holiday season, and Melanie stayed on top of it while we waited. Once we had zeroed in on a preferred property, Melanie provided the details. My client had many, many questions and Melanie answered them without complaint. Ironically when my client was ready to pay Melanie was participating in an event. Bill was her backup and the sale proceeded seamlessly.
